channel.title: Comments on: Satellite Radio arrives in Canada

item.title: By: satellite radio
item.dc:creator: satellite radio
item.description: Hi ALL...my name is Karen Johnston from TX, and I am researching Satellite Radio for a Class Project, and I found your site on Google. Wow what a nice blog you've created. Im setting up my own Blog soon and I was just looking around.
item.content:encoded: Hi ALL…my name is Karen Johnston from TX, and I am researching Satellite Radio for a Class Project, and I found your site on Google. Wow what a nice blog you’ve created. Im setting up my own Blog soon and I was just looking around.
